price: 他们说：“我们赞你超绝万物！你才是我们的保护者，而不是他们。”不然，他们却是崇拜精灵的，他们大半信仰精灵。
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِن دُونِهِمۖ بَلۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ ٱلۡجِنَّۖ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِهِم مُّؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥānaka anta waliyyunā min dūnihim bal kānū yaʿbudūna al-jina aktharuhum bihim mu'minūna
